products.name: Classic Cheeseburger
products.description: A juicy all-beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and our special sauce on a toasted bun.

products.name: Margherita Pizza
products.description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, San Marzano tomatoes, fresh basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

products.name: Spicy Pepperoni Pizza
products.description: A crowd-pleaser with zesty pepperoni, melted mozzarella, and a spicy tomato sauce.

products.name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
products.description: A crispy fried chicken breast with pickles and tangy mayo on a brioche bun.

products.name: Fresh Garden Salad
products.description: Mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, and carrots with your choice of dressing.

products.name: Caesar Salad
products.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, crunchy croutons, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

products.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
products.description: A decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
